com.snamp

Interface Table<COLUMN>

  • Type Parameters:
    COLUMN - Type of the column descriptor. It is recommended to use String as a title for table columns.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleTable

    public interface Table<COLUMN>
    Represents generic in-memory table.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roman Sakno

        Returns a set of available columns.

        Returns the count of rows in this table.

      • getCell

        java.lang.Object getCell(COLUMN column,
                       int row)
                         throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns a cell value.
        Parameters:
        column - The cell column.
        row - The cell row (zero-based).
        Returns:
        The cell value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - The cell doesn't exist.

      • getColumnType

        java.lang.Class<?> getColumnType(COLUMN column)
                                 throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns the type of values at the specified column.
        Parameters:
        column - The column ID.
        Returns:
        The type of values at the specified column.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - The specified column doesn't exist.

      • setCell

        void setCell(COLUMN column,
           int row,
           java.lang.Object value)
             throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                    java.lang.ClassCastException
        Sets cell value.
        Parameters:
        column - The column identifier.
        row - The row number (zero-based).
        value - The cell value to set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Operation is not supported because this table is read-only.
        java.lang.ClassCastException - The value type is not compliant with column type.

      • addRow

        void addRow(java.util.Map<COLUMN,java.lang.Object> values)
            throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                   java.lang.ClassCastException,
                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a new row to the end of the table.
        Parameters:
        values - The values of the row.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Operation is not supported because this table is read-only.
        java.lang.ClassCastException - The value type is not compliant with column type.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The count of values doesn't match to column count.

      • removeRow

        void removeRow(int rowIndex)
               throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Removes the row from this table.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - An index of the row to remove.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Operation is not supported because this table is read-only.
